description.author: Digital Asset and Ghcide contributors
description.description: A library for building Haskell IDE's on top of the GHC API.

package-flags.name: ghc-patched-unboxed-bytecode
package-flags.description: The GHC version we link against supports unboxed sums and tuples in bytecode

package-flags.name: ekg
package-flags.description: Enable EKG monitoring of the build graph and other metrics on port 8999
